official_title: A resolution requesting the President to issue a proclamation designating the last school day in April as "National Pledge Allegiance to Our Flag Day".

summary.text: Authorizes and requests the President to designate the last day in April of each year which is not a Saturday or Sunday as "National Pledge Allegiance to Our Flag Day."
